title: Bug 2920[Workbench] IMemento.getChildren does not match Javadoc API spec (1GKNTYG)
description: Bug 2920[Workbench] IMemento.getChildren does not match Javadoc API spec (1GKNTYG)
OB: The Javadoc API of IMemento.getChildren specifies that a listis returned but the code returns an array.NOTES:
